title: UPDATE PULSFIRE EZREAL SKIN
body: For a legendary skin its incredibly old, i mean its been out for quiet some time but compared to some other skins coming out it just doesn't look as good as them, and this is a legendary skin. PLZ rito

replies.body: It's not a skin, it's a 'theme', or at least that's what rito said when it was released.
It looks mean, it doesn't need any visual updates lol.
